translation.en: Alpha Base, still no sign of the creature.
Captain Lightspeed, our trackers show that Cruncher is right behind you.
translation.de: Captain, der Cruncher ist direkt hinter Ihnen.

translation.en: Negative Alpha Base. Believe me, if it was right on top of me, I'd know.
translation.de: Negativ, Alpha-Basis. Glaubt mir, das wüsste ich.

translation.en: It's right on top of me!
-I prepared you a light lunch. -[roars]
Here you go, chubby.
Is that a muffin-top I see?
Ugh! Forget weapons. I should've brought some breath mints.
But you can start flossing with this.
translation.de: Hier, putz dir mal die Zähne.

translation.en: Or not.
Time to wake up the babies.
[Reid] Wake up the babies?
Whenever they refer to weapons as babies, you know it's gonna be sick.
translation.de: Wenn sie Waffen Babys nennen, wird es fett.

translation.en: [Buckethead laughs] Dude, are you kidding me? You're at the second to last level of Planet Master.
translation.de: Echt jetzt, Alter? Das vorletzte Level von Planet Master!

translation.en: Nobody's ever made it this far.
That's why my screen name is Fearless and not Buckethead.
translation.de: Ich heiße ja auch Fearless, nicht Holzkopf.

translation.en: You've gotta come up with a better name than Buckethead. [Zoinker] Why? His head is an empty bucket.
translation.de: -Du brauchst was Besseres. -Tja, er hat einen Holzhelm.

translation.en: -[Buckethead] Shut your face. -[Wonderpunk] Watch the tail.
-Watch it. -[Zoinker] The spikes are poisonous. [Buckethead] Let the man concentrate.
Yeah, you're talking to the guy who jumped a rocket cycle over Apocalypse Canyon.
translation.de: Ja, habt ihr mit meinen Raketensalto vergessen?

translation.en: Okay, let's wake up the babies. What could they be?
translation.de: Ok, die Babys. Was könnte das sein?

translation.en: Sonic blast cannons? Plasma laser disintegrators? Molten molecule melters?
Welcome to Bring Your Children to Work Day.
-Real... babies? -[Zoinker] This has gotta be a joke.
[Wonderpunk] What do these babies have, superpower puke?
I climbed to the top of the toughest video game ever made just to change diapers and sing lullabies?
translation.de: Das ist das große Finale. Und ich soll Windeln wechseln?

translation.en: All right, kids, let's see if you remember what Daddy's been teaching you
translation.de: Ok, Kinder. Zeigt Daddy, was ihr gelernt habt.

translation.en: after nap time.
translation.de: Zeigt Daddy, was ihr gelernt habt.

translation.en: -Little bigger than a salad fork, buddy. -Ah!
Ah, you'll get there.
Trust me, kids, when you get bigger, so will your powers.
translation.de: Schon gut. Eure Kräfte werden mit der Zeit wachsen. Aufgepasst!

translation.en: Watch Daddy.
translation.de: Eure Kräfte werden mit der Zeit wachsen. Aufgepasst!

translation.en: [Buckethead] Can we blow something up? These babies are boring.
translation.de: Können wir was sprengen? Das ist öde.

translation.en: They'll cost me the mission. Isn't there a space stroller I can put these kids in?
translation.de: Die kosten mich das Level. Gibt's keinen Kinderwagen.

translation.en: [Buckethead] You hit that final level. You're a gamer god!
translation.de: Du bist im letzten Level! Du bist ein Gamer-Gott!

translation.en: Call me Fearless.
Nothing can stop me now. Nothing!
Oh, except her.
-Hey, Mom. -[Mom] Hi, sweetie.Just checkin' in.
translation.de: -Hey, Mom. -Hi, Schatz. Ich wollte nur sichergehen, dass du nicht nur daddelst.

translation.en: I wanna make sure you're not playing video games while we're gone all weekend.
translation.de: Ich wollte nur sichergehen, dass du nicht nur daddelst.

translation.en: -That's ridiculous. -[Mom] And I'm reminding you
translation.de: Ach was! In zwei Wochen ist dein Projekt fällig.

translation.en: that your science project is due in two weeks.
translation.de: In zwei Wochen ist dein Projekt fällig.

translation.en: -Your partner still coming over tonight? -Yup.
-This guy's a monster. -[Mom] What?
Uh, it's a monster homework assignment, and I'm on it.
translation.de: Monsterprojekt, meine ich. Aber ich bin dran.

translation.en: [Dad] Make sure he fills out the college application!
I will, I just have to, uh, finish, a couple more things.
translation.de: Mach ich. Ich muss nur noch was erledigen.

translation.en: -[Dad] Like another video game! -I'm-- That's not what I'm doing at all.
translation.de: Etwa ein Spiel? Ich... Nein, ganz und gar nicht.

translation.en: [Mom] We should go. Dad's giving the keynote in a few minutes,
translation.de: Wir müssen los. Dad spricht gleich.

translation.en: and you know how he gets gassy
-when he gets nervous. -Okay, TMI.
-Enjoy the weekend. Don't worry about me. -[Mom] Okay. Bye, sweetie.
translation.de: -Viel Spaß. Und keine Sorge. -Ok. Bis dann, Schatz.

translation.en: -Honey? -Yup, me too, bye.
Okay, let's finish this beast.
-Death by geyser? It's a rough way to go. -[giggle]
translation.de: Tod durch Geysir? Das ist hart.

translation.en: [Reid] And cue the music, that sweet sound.
Ooh, there we go. I'm victor.
[Arcannis] Captain Lightspeed. In my way once again.
Dr. Arcannis.
Aha. Arcannis.
-This is the guy I wanna take out. -[Buckethead] Shoot him, man. He looks like asparagus.
translation.de: -Das ist mein Gegner. -Knall diesen Spargel ab, Mann!

translation.en: So pathetic, using your children to fight your battles for you.
They'll probably grow up just like their father. I bet you wonder what that's like.
translation.de: Sie eifern eben ihrem Vater nach. Verstehen Sie das?

translation.en: This is far from over, Captain.
translation.de: Es ist noch nicht vorbei, Captain.

translation.en: I will never stop until I obliterate you from the universe and conquer every planet in my path.
translation.de: Ich höre erst auf, wenn ich Sie erledigt und jeden Planeten erobert habe.

translation.en: You can make all the deadly threats you want.
translation.de: Drohen Sie nur. Aber Sie haben keine Superkräfte.

translation.en: But you don't have superpowers, and you never will.
translation.de: Drohen Sie nur. Aber Sie haben keine Superkräfte. Und dabei bleibt es auch.

translation.en: [grunts] This isn't over, Lightspeed.
Wherever heroes are needed, we'll be there.
translation.de: Wir sind da, wenn Helden gebraucht werden.

translation.en: I'll have all your powers and more
translation.de: Ich hole mir Ihre Kräfte und mehr,

translation.en: when I take it to the next level.
translation.de: wenn ich erst mal Ernst mache.

translation.en: [Buckethead] You're about to get to the final level.
translation.de: Alter, du bist im letzten Level.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] That's crazy! -[Wonderpunk] Insane!
This is big. Fearless is about to become a household name.
translation.de: Fett. Bald wird jeder Fearless kennen.

translation.en: But first, I gotta get rid of these babies. They're just gonna slow me down.
translation.de: Aber zuerst zu den Babys. Sie halten mich nur auf.

translation.en: Let me see if I-- Oh, here we go, Daycare. Okay. Looks like I can drop them off while they grow their powers.
translation.de: Mal sehen, ob... Ah, Kinderbetreuung. Hier können sie Kräfte entwickeln.

translation.en: [Zoinker] And fill their diapers.
[Reid] Let a babysitter change 'em, not me.
[Captain] Their powers are weak right now. I'm hoping they can rest up and grow them here.
translation.de: Sie sind noch schwach. Aber vielleicht wachsen sie ja hier.

translation.en: I hate to let them out of my sight, but I have a debriefing with the Galactic Council.
translation.de: Ich tue das nur ungern, aber ich muss zum Galaktischen Rat.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Their mother's at a weekend seminar: "The Dos and Don'ts of Battling Black Hole Scorpions."
translation.de: Ihre Mutter hat ein Seminar: "Alles über galaktische Skorpione."

translation.en: -You got all of their snacks, right? -Yes, Captain.
In case of emergency, you can reach me using this.
-Got it. -My interplanetary communicator. -I've seen one before. -Oh.
All right.
-There you... go. -You can let go.
Daddy loves you, baby.
Just remember that I'll always-- Okay, she's gone.
translation.de: Vergiss nicht, ich... Ok, weg ist sie.

translation.en: [Wonderpunk] How do we get from babysitting to winning this game?
translation.de: Geht's jetzt mal zurück zum Spiel?

translation.en: [Zoinker] Let's get back to blasting stuff.
[Buckethead] I say skip all the cut scenes and get to the action.
translation.de: -Ich will Explosionen! -Spul vor. Zurück zur Action.

translation.en: On second thought, I don't wanna miss anything.
One of these babiesmight lay an Easter egg. I don't know.
[Buckethead] Good point. Smart move. That's why you're number one and I'm--
translation.de: -Vielleicht gibt's ein Easter Egg. -Richtig! Darum bist du Nummer eins und ich...

translation.en: -Two thousandth and ninety-eighth. -[Buckethead] Ouch. That hurt.
As their powers increase, we make sure each baby gets a palladium pacifier.
translation.de: Jedes der Babys bekommt einen Palladiumschnuller.

translation.en: This neutralizes their power, so they don't use them, accidentally.
translation.de: Damit sie ihre Kräfte nicht versehentlich benutzen.

translation.en: Of course, yes, I remember.
All of our playrooms are reinforced steel, laser-repellent, flame-retardant,
translation.de: Unsere Räume sind aus Stahl, laser-, feuer-, erdbeben und strahlensicher.

translation.en: earthquake-proof, radiation-proof.
Oh, and tinkle-proof.
-Fleech. -Ah!
Focus.
It's time to steal some babies.
translation.de: Holen wir uns ein paar Babys.

translation.en: -[making gun noises] -And no, you may not eat them.
translation.de: Und nein, du darfst sie nicht fressen.

translation.en: [Arcannis] Come on.
Here.
I can only hope you're as strong as your father. -[snoring] -[licks lips] Umm.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, du bist so stark wie dein Vater.

translation.en: Xander. Creates anything he imagines.
translation.de: Xander. Erschafft alles, was er sich vorstellt.

translation.en: Just imagine.
Kira. The girl child of Captain Lightspeed.
-You may be the most powerful of all. -Mmm.
-[toy squeaking] -You fool!
I love you. You're my best fri--
translation.de: Ich hab dich lieb. Du bist mein bester...

translation.en: He just stole the babies. Wow, this is heating up.
translation.de: Er klaut die Babys? Wow, krass.

translation.en: -[Buckethead] Watch out for traps. -I gotta wrap this up soon.
translation.de: -Sei vorsichtig. -Ich muss bald weg. Melanie kommt.

translation.en: Melanie is coming over. We gotta work on our science project.
translation.de: -Sei vorsichtig. -Ich muss bald weg. Melanie kommt. -Wegen des Projekts. -Oh, Melanie ist heiß.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Melanie. She's fire. -[Buckethead] You're lucky.
translation.de: -Wegen des Projekts. -Oh, Melanie ist heiß. Und klug, du Glückspilz.

translation.en: She's really smart too. I got Lunch Room Louise. Ugh!
translation.de: Und klug, du Glückspilz. Ich habe die fette Louise.

translation.en: With any luck Melanie will do the project for me.
translation.de: Mit etwas Glück macht sie die Arbeit.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Sorry, I'm out. Dinner time. -[Wonderpunk] Me too.
translation.de: -Ich muss essen. -Ich auch. Schreib, wenn es gut wird.

translation.en: -Text me when it gets good. -[Reid] Later guys.
translation.de: -Ich muss essen. -Ich auch. Schreib, wenn es gut wird. -Ok. Bis dann. -Ich bleibe. Ich will nichts verpassen.

translation.en: [Buckethead] I'm with you. No way I'm missing this.
translation.de: -Ok. Bis dann. -Ich bleibe. Ich will nichts verpassen.

translation.en: Finally. Back to TheObsidian.
Yes. This is gonna be tight!
-Fleech. -[yells]
Hook up the subjects to The Extrapolator.
[gasps] This chair's all sweaty and... moist.
translation.de: Der Stuhl ist ganz verschwitzt... und feucht!

translation.en: Captain Lightspeed.You look distraught.
translation.de: Captain Lightspeed. -Warum so verzweifelt? -Arcannis. Sie Abschaum!

translation.en: Arcannis. You filth!
You took my children! If you touch one hair--
translation.de: Meine Kinder! Wenn Sie Ihnen nur...

translation.en: Please. Spare me your needless declarations and warnings.
translation.de: Ich bitte Sie. Ersparen Sie mir das.

translation.en: I just called to thank you for giving me the idea, Captain.
translation.de: Ich wollte Ihnen nur für die Anregung danken.

translation.en: "You don't have superpowers, and you never will."
translation.de: "Sie haben keine Superkräfte. Und dabei bleibt es."

translation.en: But what if I found a way?
You see, with my new Extrapolator, I have.
And who better to give them to me than your defenseless offspring?
translation.de: Und wer wäre dafür geeigneter als Ihre wehrlosen Kinder?

translation.en: You've always been jealous of my powers. Daddy issues?
translation.de: Sie waren schon immer neidisch. Vaterkomplex?

translation.en: -What? -[Captain] Your dad took over 20 or 30planetsbefore I locked him up.
And you? Hang on, let me do the math. Zero.
translation.de: Und Sie? Moment, ich zähle nach. Null.

translation.en: I'll conquer all of my father's planets and more.
translation.de: Ich werde all diese Planeten erobern. Und mehr.

translation.en: Somebody's a little obsessed.
Obsessed? Obsessed? How dare you!
translation.de: Besessen? Besessen? Wie können Sie es wagen?

translation.en: You sit on your golden throne high above the rest of us.
translation.de: Sie, auf Ihrem goldenen Thron, hoch über uns allen.

translation.en: I wasn't born with a silver spoon in my mouth. Huh.
translation.de: Ich wurde nicht mit silbernen Löffel im Mund geboren.

translation.en: But now I will make my own spoon.
A spoon that will crush you all.
translation.de: Einen Löffel, der euch alle zerquetscht!

translation.en: -That's a pretty big spoon. -It's not a real spoon, Lightspeed!
Oh, but how the tide has turned.
I will harvest your babies' powers,
and then nothing can stop me from conquering any planet I wish.
translation.de: Und dann erobere ich jeden Planeten, den ich möchte.

translation.en: My master plan is in motion,
every piece is in place
as your angelic children, peacefully slumbering,
unaware of their contribution to my unstoppable, diabolical powers.
translation.de: Nichtsahnend, welch teuflische Kräfte sie mir verleihen.

translation.en: I have anticipated even the slightest error,
every detail, every precise calculation in my favor.
I'd love to exchange more deadly threats, but I must get the little ones to my lair.
translation.de: Ich würde Ihnen gerne noch mehr drohen, aber ich muss aufhören.

translation.en: -So much power to consume, so little time. -No--!
translation.de: -So viel zu tun, so wenig Zeit. -Nein!

translation.en: -[robot] Welcome aboard. -[cooing]
[robot] Launch code accepted.
Please hang on.
Uh-oh. Warning.
Final level.
Do you accept the consequences? That's the weirdest thing I've ever seen.
translation.de: "Trägst du die Konsequenzen?" -Das ist ja schräg. -Ganz schön gruslig.

translation.en: [Buckethead] That's freaky.
Ah, it's all hype.
translation.de: Ach was, das soll mir nur Angst machen.

translation.en: They just put that in there to scare me. Nice try.
translation.de: Ach was, das soll mir nur Angst machen. Netter Versuch.

translation.en: Time for Fearless to become a legend.
Cool. There's nothing like flying through a wormhole.
[Buckethead snickers] Worm hole.
This calls for more caffeine. [Buckethead] Hear that. I'm gonna go eat a pie.
-Okay. -[door bell rings]
Oh, not now.
-Hang on. -[whirling]
Okay, you don't have to knock so hard. I heard the bell the first time.
translation.de: Ist ja gut, nicht so fest. Ich habe dich gehört. Meine Güte.

translation.en: Jeez Louise.
translation.de: Ich habe dich gehört. Meine Güte.

translation.en: -General Blazerhatch. -[General] I'll take a coffee, black.
What's the skinny on our UFO?
The object came from outside Earth's atmosphere at 1900 hours.
translation.de: Es kam von außerhalb der Atmosphäre, um 19 Uhr.

translation.en: We're picking up vital signs from inside the object.
Sweet God in heaven.
I guess I'll take that coffee... to go.
translation.de: Ich nehme den Kaffee besser auf die Hand.

translation.en: No! No!
Imbecile.
You pile of worthless skin cells.
You only had to get them into The Extrapolator.
translation.de: Du musstest sie nur zum Extrapolator bringen.

translation.en: Let's go hunting.
Melanie. Hey. Hi. Uh, come on in.
I'm not interrupting anything, am I?
No. I was just saving the world. You know, uh, Planet Master?
translation.de: Nein. Ich habe nur die Welt gerettet. Bei Planet Master.

translation.en: [scoffs] I don't really play video games.
Yeah, I'm kind of a big deal online. Fearless, that's my gamer tag.
translation.de: Ich bin online berühmt. Ich heiße Fearless.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. I spend my time studying. Really focused on graduating right now.
translation.de: Ja. Ich lerne lieber. Ich bereite mich auf den Abschluss vor.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. Me too.
I figure if we work on this 3 hours a night for 2 nights, we'll have this project done this weekend.
translation.de: Zwei Abende à drei Stunden und wir schaffen es am Wochenende.

translation.en: Or 2 hours a night over the next week. I have both schedules here.
translation.de: Oder nächste Woche zwei Stunden pro Abend. Beides geht.

translation.en: Wh-- Whoa, that's a lot of scheduling. Did you schedule any bathroom breaks?
translation.de: Ziemlich viel Planung. Sind auch Pinkelpausen geplant?

translation.en: Of course. Twice an hour.
This is 30 percent of our grade, Reid. I'm taking it seriously. So let's get to brainstorming.
translation.de: Das sind 30 % unserer Note. Ich nehme es ernst. Also los.

translation.en: -I'm sure you have some ideas. -Sure.
Like...
There's solar power.
-Uh, the electricity of light. -[snaps fingers]
Uhhh. Arcannis effect on lightspeed.
Space travel!
I was thinking advanced geometric telecommunications.
Or rocket boots. You wanna make rocket boots?
-These are just rough ideas. Oh. -[thudding]
See, this-- this is why I'm not a fan of partner projects. I'm usually the only one who does any work.
translation.de: Darum mag ich Partnerprojekte nicht. Weil ich die Einzige bin, die arbeitet.

translation.en: This is gonna be a long night. Might as well take our first break now.
translation.de: Das wird ein langer Abend. Machen wir erst mal Pause.

translation.en: -Where's your bathroom? -First door down the hall.
Can you at least crack a notebook while I'm gone? Write down one idea.
translation.de: Hol dir inzwischen wenigstens einen Block. Schreib etwas auf.

translation.en: I guess she's not gonna do the whole project for me.
translation.de: Sie wird es wohl nicht allein machen.

translation.en: What?
That was weird.
Baby. Here from the game. [chuckles] Okay…
translation.de: Ein Baby. Aus dem Spiel. Ok.

translation.en: Uh, well, this can't be actually happening.
-Another one? Did they all come here? -[cooing]
translation.de: Noch eins? Sind sie alle hier?

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Bu-- Just stay.
-Ahh. -Whoa. Oh, baby.
Whoa. Don't eat...
No, no, no, no. You can't be here. This doesn't make sense.
translation.de: Nein, niemals. Das ergibt keinen Sinn.

translation.en: Just put you back in the game. Uh. Come on. Come on!
translation.de: Geht zurück ins Spiel. Na los.

translation.en: What is this? I found a baby in here.
translation.de: Was ist hier los? Da war ein Baby.

translation.en: What?
There are more? When did you start babysitting?
translation.de: Noch mehr? Seit wann babysittest du?

translation.en: They're not really-- Here's the thing. These babies are from Planet Master.
translation.de: Sie sind nicht... Hör zu, die Babys sind aus Planet Master.

translation.en: Stop with the jokes, Reid. Whose kids are these?
translation.de: Lass das. Wessen Kinder sind das?

translation.en: It might be hard to believe,
translation.de: Na ja, das sind die Kinder von...

translation.en: but these are actually the children of… Captain Lightspeed.
translation.de: Na ja, das sind die Kinder von... ...Captain Lightspeed.

translation.en: And he's in the video game. [chuckles] They have super powers.
translation.de: Aus dem Videospiel. Sie haben Superkräfte.

translation.en: If you're trying to bail on the science project, just say so.
translation.de: Willst du dich drücken? Sag's einfach.

translation.en: I will figure this out.
Until I do, we can still work on the project.
-I just have to keep them busy. -And how are you gonna do that?
Okay, toys. You want toys. Here you go.
-This is a shoe, and here is a ball. -[coos]
-Uh, and this is a mouse. -[coos]
-[cries] -Oh, what is-- What's happening?
translation.de: Was denn? Was ist los? Nicht doch.

translation.en: What's this? Don't make that sound. Noooo, no, no, no.
translation.de: Was denn? Was ist los? Nicht doch. -Nein, nicht. -Oh, hier. Das klappt meistens.

translation.en: Oh, here, these usually work.
I'm gonna go find them something more appropriate to play with.
translation.de: Ich suche etwas Passenderes zum Spielen.

translation.en: Fine, great.
There's gotta be a cheat code to delete you, or...
translation.de: Man muss euch doch löschen können.

translation.en: -[coos] -Where's the third one?
Oh, no, no, no, no, where'd he go? Okay.
translation.de: Oh, nein, wo ist er hin? Ok.

translation.en: Here. Uh, play with this.
-[coos] -Yup, that's a ball.
-[whines] -Yeah, you got it.
-[cries] -Look, I get it, you wanna-- Oh!
And now your powers are getting stronger? Please, not here.
translation.de: Eure Kräfte werden stärker? Bitte nicht hier.

translation.en: Oh. Hey, not the bookshelf. Get down.
You do not throw a book at me, okay? That's not a toy.
translation.de: Keine Bücher, ok? Das ist kein Spielzeug.

translation.en: And you are a bad baby.
Oh! No, no!
What happened? Anybody hurt?
Just you. You gotta be more careful around little kids.
translation.de: Ach, du. Pass besser auf, das sind Babys.

translation.en: -They're not just kids-- -You figure out what to do
with these babies. I'm gonna go work in the kitchen and get something done.
translation.de: Ich arbeite in der Küche weiter.

translation.en: Laugh it up, you little space gremlins.
If I got you here, I'm gonna figure out how to send you back.
translation.de: Ich schicke euch schon noch zurück.

translation.en: -[screams] -Oh, shrimp. Okay...
Everything all right?
-Um. Hey, kid, why don't you just-- -[laughs]
What are you trying to do in here? Teach them professional wrestling?
No, I've been trying to tell you, these babies are from Planet Master, the video game.
translation.de: Ich sagte doch, sie sind aus Planet Master. Dem Spiel.

translation.en: I played the final level and somehow broke the laws of time and space
and brought them... here.
Reid, I don't have time for this. I came here to work.
translation.de: Lass das, Reid. Ich bin hier, um zu arbeiten.

translation.en: -Can you just focus on-- -Put down the couch!
Put down what?
-Fine. You wanna play games? -[giggles]
You can keep babysitting or whatever this is.
I'm gonna ask Mrs. Wilson to assign me another partner.
-This isn't my fault. It's this game. -You really need to grow up.
I'm not gonna let some slacker like you crash my whole GPA.
translation.de: Ein Faulpelz wie du versaut mir nicht den Notenschnitt.

translation.en: Go back to your video games.
You seem to be more successful there than you are in real life.
translation.de: Dabei kriegst du offenbar mehr gebacken.

translation.en: Who threw the shoe?
Well, congratulations.
You ruined her night. You ruined my night.
translation.de: Ihr habt uns den Abend ruiniert.

translation.en: You ruined half my house. Well done.
translation.de: Und das halbe Haus. Gut gemacht.

translation.en: Oh yeah, give yourself a hand. [claps]
Video game babies.
[Mission Control] Houston, we've lost satellite 1187. Are you seeing…
translation.de: Houston, wir haben Satellit 1187 verloren. Sehen Sie…

translation.en: [Houston Control] Mission Control, we are losing your signal, are you...
translation.de: Wir verlieren Ihr Signal. Sind Sie...

translation.en: The second object just entered the atmosphere. We're tracking it now.
translation.de: Ein zweites Objekt. Wir verfolgen es.

translation.en: Get me the Pentagon. I want the Air Force ready to shake a big stick at this.
translation.de: Pentagon anfunken. Ich will die Air Force.

translation.en: Someone hand me an important file.
-Put this on a clipboard. -Yes, ma'am.
I want a clipboard handed to me every 2 minutes.
translation.de: Ich will alle zwei Minuten ein Klemmbrett!

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
I want this retyped in bold Courier font, all caps.
translation.de: Und tippt das neu ab. Courier, fett, Versalien.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
When this chopper lands and my black Cadillacs hit the ground, I want a base camp waiting, gentlemen.
translation.de: Wenn wir landen, will ich ein Basiscamp sehen, Gentlemen.

translation.en: No bug-eyed moon man is gonna probe the U.S. of A. on my watch.
translation.de: Mit mir legt sich kein Käferkopf an.

translation.en: [all] Yes, ma'am.
Through a wormhole? From a video game?
translation.de: Durch ein Wurmloch? Aus einem Spiel?

translation.en: I don't know how to explain it, but we have to send these babies back
translation.de: Tja, wir müssen sie einfach zurückschicken.

translation.en: -into the game. -We? There is no "we."
These kids would break Mary Poppins in half.
translation.de: Diese Babys würden Mary Poppins in Stücke reißen.

translation.en: Hey.
You need to call animal control or the police.
translation.de: Ruf die Tierrettung oder die Polizei.

translation.en: No cops. Last thing I need is that phone call to my parents.
translation.de: Nein, die rufen nur meine Eltern an.

translation.en: I'm outta here. You're on your own. Are you crazy? -I can't handle this on my own! -[baby squeals]
translation.de: -Ich gehe. Mach das allein. -Was? Das kann ich nicht!

translation.en: Please help me. Just until I can send them back where they came from.
translation.de: Hilf mir. Nur bis sie wieder weg sind.

translation.en: Wrangling space babies was not part of my schedule today, okay?
translation.de: Weltraumbabys standen nicht auf dem Plan, ok?

translation.en: Hmm. You are pathetic.
-[babies cooing] -I gotta call my parents.
Thank you.
Mom. Yeah, I know.
This big project just got... a lot bigger than I thought.
translation.de: Das Projekt ist umfangreicher, als ich dachte.

translation.en: Might go pretty late.
Okay. Bye!
What? Ew.
Uh. What's--
-[Reid] Oh, smells so bad I can see it. -[Melanie] That's pure human suffering.
translation.de: -Man kann den Gestank sogar sehen! -Pures menschliches Leid!

translation.en: [Captain] I finally found your secret lair, Arcannis.
translation.de: Da ist ja Ihr Versteck, Arcannis.

translation.en: [base leader] Captain, careful. Walking into that lair is like walking into a seven layer lasagna of death.
translation.de: Vorsicht, Captain. Diese Höhle ist eine Lasagne des Todes.

translation.en: Then get me my bib.
translation.de: Dann her mit dem Lätzchen. Ich hole jetzt meine Babys.

translation.en: I'm going in to get my babies back, and it's about to get messy.
translation.de: Dann her mit dem Lätzchen. Ich hole jetzt meine Babys. Und das wird unschön.

translation.en: [Captain] Nine against one? That hardly seems fair.
Looks like you guys could use a recharge.
[game narrator] Game on.
Power up.
Hold it down.
Sorry. Did I cut you off?
[game narrator echoing] Level up.
Thanks for the workout, guys.
Palladium? I've got no powers.
Surprise. I'm not here right now.
translation.de: Überraschung. Ich bin gerade nicht hier.

translation.en: And neither are your precious children.
Please, make yourself at home.
translation.de: Fühlen Sie sich wie zu Hause.

translation.en: If your home is a maze of merciless death traps!
translation.de: Falls Ihr Zuhause ein Labyrinth des Todes ist!

translation.en: I'm no good at mazes!
[Arcannis] Ugh. Fleech.
So sorry, master.
Give me the scanner. All right, then.
This blasted planet is thick with interference.
Radio waves, satellite waves.
It's time for a little help from my friends.
Hello, my darlings. Off you go.
translation.de: Hallo, meine Lieben. Fort mit euch.

translation.en: Find my little runaways.
-Fleech, did you set this on stun? -Ah.
Hm. Yes, you did.
The pod is close.
It appears we have landed on...
-Earth? -Verr...
That's the name?
-Sounds like a stomach virus. -Ew. Or the name of a pet worm.
translation.de: Klingt wie ein Magenvirus. Oder ein Wurm.

translation.en: Or a type of mucous.
-[imitates farting sounds] -Uh. Yes. That's it.
When a Noglar squats in the woods...
it takes an "earth."
Oh. Wow.
Is this what I think it is?
-Oh. -[Captain] You evil scum.
I'm gonna blast you into the Jade Nebula when I find you.
translation.de: Ich schieße dich in den Jadenebel!

translation.en: -Captain Lightspeed? Is that you? -Who are you talking to?
translation.de: Captain? Sind Sie das? Wer ist das?

translation.en: It's the captain, you know? Remember the-- Oh.
translation.de: Der Captain. Du weißt schon, aus...

translation.en: This is Captain Darius Lightspeed, Galactic Defense Commander.
translation.de: Captain Darius Lightspeed, Galactic Defense Commander.

translation.en: Uh, this is Reid. Senior, McKinley High School.
What have you done with my children, Reid Senior McKinley High School?
translation.de: Wo sind meine Kinder, Reis Senior McKinley High School?

translation.en: I'll vaporize you where you stand!
Hold on. We're on the same side. I've been on a hundred missions with you.
translation.de: Halt, ich war mit dir auf 100 Missionen.

translation.en: Shooting plasma falcons, breaking out of gravity prison,
translation.de: Die Plasmafalken, das Schwerkraftgefängnis, das Wurmvolk...

translation.en: -remember the worm people? -Is he wearing a Danskin?
translation.de: Die Plasmafalken, das Schwerkraftgefängnis, das Wurmvolk... Trägt er etwa Leggings?

translation.en: [both] It's called a uniform!
-Did I call at a bad time? -Nothin' I can't handle.
Just another day on the job. Don't change the subject. Do you have my babies or not?
translation.de: Ein typischer Arbeitstag. Aber lenk nicht ab. Hast du die Babys?

translation.en: [Reid] I do have them. They've destroyed my home. You need to pick them up ASAP.
translation.de: Ja. Sie haben mein Haus zerstört. Sie müssen sie holen.

translation.en: Reid, no other mission is more important than this. I need you to keep my kids safe.
translation.de: Reid, keine Mission ist wichtiger. Du musst meine Kinder beschützen.

translation.en: Use their palladium pacifiers to neutralize their powers.
Right. Okay.
There's more. If you have the babies, Arcannis is coming for you.
translation.de: Das war noch nicht alles. Arcannis wird euch jagen.

translation.en: Arcannis, who?
Dr. Arcannis.
The most devious criminal mind in the galaxy.
Yup, that's the guy.
Looks like the Grinch got some bad plastic surgery.
translation.de: Wie der Grinch nach einer missratenen OP.

translation.en: If he gets a hold of my children, he will take their powers as his own.
translation.de: Wenn er meine Kinder kriegt, stiehlt er ihre Kräfte

translation.en: And the first planet he conquers will be yours.
Okay. I'm out. I'm afraid you've both been marked.
translation.de: -Ok, ich bin raus. -Er hat euch beide im Visier.

translation.en: -I don't wanna be marked. -Well, you are.
If I can track you, so can he. He probably already knows where you are.
translation.de: Wenn ich dich finde, findet er dich auch.

translation.en: Give me a second to trace your signal, and I'll be able to locate you.
translation.de: Warte kurz, ich verfolge dein Signal.

translation.en: I can't be marked. I've got my own plans. I wanna go to college.
translation.de: Nein, ich habe Pläne. Ich will aufs College.

translation.en: I wanna get married.
I still have a $200 Sephora gift card I've never spent, and now I'm marked.
translation.de: Ich habe noch eine Geschenkkarte von Sephora!

translation.en: -Dada. -No, no, no, don't!
-No! -No!
He's gone.
How's he gonna find us now?
Reid. We've gotta get out of here.
And don't think this gets you out of our science project.
translation.de: Und glaub nicht, dass Projekt wäre erledigt.

translation.en: I need an ETA on the surveillance truck and an ETA on lunch.
translation.de: Was macht der Überwachungswagen? Und mein Mittagessen?

translation.en: No onions on the burger this time.
No... onions.
[Arcannis] Ah, the smell of ripe diaper.
translation.de: Ah, der Geruch einer vollen Windel.

translation.en: -They were here, all right. -Yeah.
Looks just like my lab.
They are getting stronger.
We must find my little runaways quickly.
We are so close. I can smell them.
translation.de: Wir sind so nah dran. Ich kann sie riechen.

translation.en: I will find you.
Do you mind?
We have to call our parents and the police. This has gone far enough.
translation.de: Wir müssen unsere Eltern und die Polizei anrufen.

translation.en: We can't call anyone. You heard Lightspeed, Arcannis is tracking us.
He could be tracking our phones. You don't wanna put your family
translation.de: Er hört vielleicht mit. Willst du deine Familie gefährden?

translation.en: in danger too, do you? No! No kicking, please, space babies.
translation.de: Willst du deine Familie gefährden? Nicht treten, ihr Weltraumbabys.

translation.en: Do not let them tear this car apart.
Let's find some music?
Okay. They love Lionel Richie.
-Seriously? -Hey. He's a national treasure.
These guys get it.
What is this?
Oh no. Okay, everybody be cool. You babies, be cool.
translation.de: Oh nein. Ok, cool bleiben. Ihr auch, Babys.

translation.en: You be cool.
Maybe we just hand these kids over to them.
Are you kidding? Have you heard what the military does to aliens?
translation.de: Was? Weißt du, was die mit Aliens machen?

translation.en: -Can you cut the music? -But he's a national treasure.
translation.de: -Mach das bitte aus. -Aber er ist eine Legende.

translation.en: Where're you kids going today?
-Camping! -Road trip. Uh...
-Camping road trip, to go camping. -What he said.
Is the air safe out here?
Just a precaution. We'll ask the questions.
We're checking cars for anything peculiar.
Nothin' peculiar here.
Uh, very, very normal car. We're all normal here. How are you?
translation.de: Ganz normal. Wir sind alle normal. Und Sie?

translation.en: -We're gonna need to look in the trunk. -No problem.
Uh, nice mask.
Any relation to Darth?
You packed a toaster.
I've never been camping. I had no idea what I'd need.
translation.de: Na ja, ich war noch nie campen.

translation.en: You've got roller skates here too.
I really didn't think it through on a lot of this. I see that now.
Is that a pool noodle?
Uhh... you never know.
So, uh, you're not much of a talker, are you?
-Hey! Stop! -Bye-bye.
Get back here with my jeep! Get back here! Hey!
translation.de: Mein Jeep! Komm sofort zurück! Hey!

translation.en: Oh, we are so going to jail.
No, no, no! I don't wanna die this way!
-No! Huh! I don't wanna die this way! No! -[giggles]
translation.de: Nein! So will ich nicht sterben! Nicht!

translation.en: -No! -[yells]
No!
What's going on here? -How-- -What happened?
-We've gotta get back on the road. -There was a bubble.
You saw a bubble?
I was in a bubble. A big purple, a big purple balloon.
translation.de: Eine Blase. Wie ein großer lila Ballon.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense. Does that make sense? Nope, no sense.
I was in a big bubble. I'm serious.
translation.de: Ich war in einer Blase. Im Ernst.

translation.en: It's those babies. One of 'em took my car. He chased me.
translation.de: Das Baby hat mein Auto geklaut und mich verfolgt.

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, a baby stole your car? Is your mask on too tight, Ronnie?
translation.de: Ein Baby hat dein Auto geklaut? Sitzt deine Maske zu eng, Ronnie?

translation.en: No. I mean... I don't-- I don't think so.
translation.de: Nein! Na ja, ich glaube nicht.

translation.en: [Reid] Whoa, baby.
Titus...
put the car down.
Yes. Now.
No, don't throw it!
Well, he put it down.
No cookie for you, Titus! No cookie!
I'm so sorry. Have a nice day. [chuckles]
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Schönen Tag noch.

translation.en: Okay, let's turn up that music.
-We gotta get off the road. -[Melanie] I know the perfect place.
translation.de: -Wir müssen von der Straße runter. -Ich weiß wohin.

translation.en: Mother of all things holy.
Our sweet green Earth is living on borrowed time.
translation.de: Für unsere Erde tickt die Uhr.

translation.en: My guess puts these creatures at six, seven feet tall.
translation.de: Ich schätze, sie sind ungefähr zwei Meter groß.

translation.en: Some kind of space predator.
Multiple arms, possibly tentacles.
Claws of a wolverine.
They probably shoot spider babies right outta their face.
-[sniffs] -[soldier] General.
-Neighbors saw a car leave two hours ago. -Get me that plate.
Put that in a bag with a number on it. Somebody hand me a clipboard.
translation.de: In eine Tüte damit. Und gebt mir ein Klemmbrett!

translation.en: General, we got a hit at one of the checkpoints. Something they're calling super freaky-deaky.
translation.de: General? Eine Meldung vom Wachposten. Etwas total Verrücktes.

translation.en: Define freaky-deaky, Private.
-Babies. Babies. Babies -Babies? Babies? Babies?
What do you mean, babies?
Super-powered alien babies. Cute but deadly.
translation.de: Alienbabys mit Superkräften. Süß, aber tödlich.

translation.en: They... probably shape-shifted into the form of their human victims.
translation.de: Sie haben wahrscheinlich die Form ihrer Opfer angenommen.

translation.en: Put out an APB, all channels!
We're looking for infants... of mass destruction.
You got anything in your date planner about surviving in the woods?
translation.de: Steht in deinem Planer etwas über Überleben im Wald?

translation.en: [Melanie] You're talking to Camp Nogiwa's "Camper of the Year," gamer boy.
translation.de: Du sprichst mit Camp Nogiwas "Camper des Jahres".

translation.en: Come on, Fearless. Let's set up camp.
Hey. How about a hand? Aren't you supposed to be super strong?
translation.de: Helft mir mal. Ihr seid doch so stark.

translation.en: Oh, no, baby, don't--! Uh...
But please tell me you brought some toilet paper.
translation.de: Bitte sag, dass du Klopapier dabeihast.

translation.en: Well, I've got some drive-through receipts in the car.
I was supposed to go to Red Lobster with my girlfriends tonight.
translation.de: Ich war heute Abend bei Red Lobster verabredet.

translation.en: -Are you gonna be able to fix that thing? -I'd better. Or I'm gonna miss Crabfest.
translation.de: -Kriegst du das hin? -Ich hoff's. Sonst gibt's keine Krabben.

translation.en: Besides, it's just a machine. There has to be a way.
translation.de: Außerdem ist es nur eine Maschine.

translation.en: Uh, just seems like we're a little out of our league here, y'know?
translation.de: Das ist etwas zu groß für uns, oder?

translation.en: Well, all we can do is try, y'know? Put in some effort?
We need to get this done, so we can get back to our science project.
translation.de: Wir müssen zurück zu unserem Projekt.

translation.en: Think that brain of yours can solve something other than a video game?
translation.de: Kriegst du etwas anderes hin als Videospiele?

translation.en: Hey, little guy.
Uh, I wonder what you're thinkin'. I wonder--
[Melanie laughs] You said it, Titus.
Uh! Where have they gone?
Oh! You got me.
Hi.
Radio repair.
[phone] Rainbows and Bears.
Oh, come on.
-Titus! Do not drop a tree on your sister. -[giggles]
translation.de: Titus! Keinen Baum auf deine Schwester werfen.

translation.en: -He did that on his own. -He's really getting better.
translation.de: -Das war er selbst. -Er wird immer besser.

translation.en: [sighs] These pieces are so tiny. I can't see what I'm doing.
translation.de: Es ist so winzig. Ich sehe gar nichts.

translation.en: Let me try something.
Xander, can you make this?
Make big ones.
Oh, man. He's doing it.
That does help.
Look. Spin this one, it fits here.
-Okay. I see it. -There we go.
Pretty good, Xander.
You did it. Genius.
Did you have any doubt?
Thanks.
Eight, nine, ten. Yup, still got 'em all.
translation.de: Acht, neun, zehn. Ja, alle noch da.

translation.en: Captain's log. I continue to wander this maze like a rat.
translation.de: Logbuch: Ich fühle mich hier wie eine Ratte.

translation.en: It's endless. Dead end.
translation.de: Es nimmt kein Ende. Oh, Sackgasse.

translation.en: Or not. Captain's log. I hate mazes.
translation.de: Oder auch nicht. Logbuch: Ich hasse Labyrinthe.

translation.en: You gotta be kidding me.
You gotta be kidding!
This is our best vantage point to scan the entire town.
translation.de: Hier können wir die ganze Stadt scannen.

translation.en: Access the drones.
[mother] Are you listening to me? [daughter] I listen to you all day, Mother.Do you ever listen to me?
translation.de: -Hörst du mir zu? -Ständig, Mutter. Hörst du jemals mir zu?

translation.en: [barista] That's a grande mocha half-caf macchiato, no whip, no foam.
translation.de: Einen Mokka-Macchiato ohne Sahne und Schaum.

translation.en: [piano teacher] …3, and 4. And 1, and 2, and 3--
translation.de: ...und drei und vier. Und eins, und zwei, und drei...

translation.en: [DJ] Yo yo. Takin' your calls. It's your boy, UP NYC on The Noize 105 FM.
translation.de: Yo, ruft mich an. Hier ist UP NYC auf Noize 105 FM.

translation.en: -Hit me up. Tell me what you wanna hear. -[mutters angrily]
Hey now, don't be shy. You on The Noize.
translation.de: Nur zu, hier ist The Noize.

translation.en: Who's this?
This is Dr. Arcannis, overlord of cosmic domination.
Yo, whaddup, Einstein? What song you wanna play on the hit list?
translation.de: Yo, Einstein? Was willst du hören?

translation.en: I don't have time for this.
"I Don't Have Time For This" by Dreadlock Killah.
-That's not what I mean. -"That's Not What I Mean" by MC Saltshaka.
I am looking for babies.
"Looking For My Baby" by JJ Squash.
Stop this foolishness.
You will soon be my slaves, and this planet will be a wasteland!
translation.de: Ihr seid bald meine Sklaven. Und dieser Planet eine Wüste!

translation.en: Congratulations, my man. You just requested the new jam of the week.
translation.de: Glückwunsch, Mann! Das ist unser Song der Woche.

translation.en: -How is that even possible? -[DJ] "You Will Be My Slaves,
translation.de: Wie bitte? "Ihr seid meine Sklaven und die Erde meine Wüste"

translation.en: And This Planet Will Be My Wasteland" by DJ Euripides.
translation.de: "Ihr seid meine Sklaven und die Erde meine Wüste" von DJ Euripides.

translation.en: [Melanie] At least we put this thing back together, but it's still not working.
translation.de: Es ist zwar wieder ganz, funktioniert aber nicht.

translation.en: -Maybe it's a power thing? -The signal is really weak.
translation.de: Liegt's am Strom? Der Empfang ist mies.

translation.en: We need to, like, hijack a satellite for this. Use some NASA-level gear.
translation.de: Wir bräuchten einen Satelliten. Oder NASA-Ausrüstung.

translation.en: Let me make a call to NASA. I'll get right on it.
[laughs] You're not half bad at this stuff when you put your mind to it.
translation.de: Du bist gar nicht so übel, wenn du es versuchst.

translation.en: Uh, thank you?
Maybe it's all the fresh air and trees and bugs and going potty in the woods. Opens up my mind a bit.
translation.de: Vielleicht liegt's an der Umgebung. Oder dem Klo im Wald. Das befreit.

translation.en: Wow. Look at you. Acknowledging there's a real world.
translation.de: Sieh an. Es gibt also eine echte Welt?

translation.en: Maybe you're not a complete lost cause after all. [chuckles] Maybe not.
translation.de: -Es gibt wohl doch noch Hoffnung. -Ja, vielleicht.

translation.en: So... any plans after we graduate, or are you just gonna float around in virtual reality?
translation.de: Was machst du nach der Schule? Oder bleibst du in deiner Zockerwelt?

translation.en: At least in the game world, you don't get called names, flunk a class,
translation.de: Da wird man wenigstens nicht beschimpft, fällt durch oder muss alleine zum Ball.

translation.en: or get turned down for prom. It's all about the fun.
translation.de: Da wird man wenigstens nicht beschimpft, fällt durch oder muss alleine zum Ball. Es geht um Spaß.

translation.en: Here in the real world, I've got my fingers crossed for MIT.
translation.de: Tja, also ich will aufs MIT.

translation.en: Majoring in biochemical engineering.
Wow. You've got it all planned out.
Well, sure. Even those ducks are charting a course, Reid.
translation.de: Klar. Selbst Enten folgen einem Kurs, Reid.

translation.en: They don't just drift wherever the current goes. Is that all you're gonna do? Just drift?
translation.de: Sie lassen sich nicht nur treiben. Hast du das etwa vor?

translation.en: I'm sick of working on this. Time to work on a sandwich.
translation.de: Mir reicht's. Zeit für ein Sandwich.

translation.en: -Hope you like pastrami. -[cooing] You guys like pastrami?
translation.de: Magst du Pastrami? Was ist mit euch?

translation.en: Little pastrami on rye. Got some kraut and mustard. I'm making Reubens.
translation.de: Pastrami auf Roggenbrötchen? Etwas Kraut, Senf...

translation.en: -[whines] -Hey, don't get cranky.
Look at these two guys. They're not cranky. Look.
[in deep voice] Hi, Mr. Spoon. That's Dr. Spoon from space.
translation.de: Hey, Mr. Löffel. Dr. Löffel, aus dem All.

translation.en: Get away from me.
-I have a PhD! -[laughing]
How about, um...
I'm Colonel Mustard. What's the ruckus?
translation.de: Oberst Senf hier. Was ist los?

translation.en: [in French accent] Please, no fighting. I'm just a moist towelette.
translation.de: Bitte nicht. Ich bin nur ein Erfrischungstuch.

translation.en: Don't play with Dr. Spoon like that. You're gonna hurt him.
translation.de: Nicht so grob. Ihr tut Dr. Löffel weh.

translation.en: Hey, let's play peekaboo.
-This guy loves peekaboo. -Yeah.
-Peek. Peek. -[squeals] Peek. Peekaboo, huh?
-[Melanie] Don't scare him. -Here I go. -[Melanie] You'll set his powers off. -Hmm.
translation.de: Mach ihm keine Angst, Reid. Denk an seine Kräfte.

translation.en: If you can't see my face, where am I?
-[Melanie] You got too big. -Peekaboo!
-[Melanie] I told you not to scare him! -[Reid] Okay, everybody in the car!
translation.de: -Was hab ich gesagt? -Ok, alle ins Auto!

translation.en: Captain's log: more maze.
This part is different. Maybe it's a way out.
Nope. Just the opposite.
That sounds...
alive.
Looks like Arcannis's monster had some babies.
That's fitting. Killed by babies.
Very ironic.
[Melanie] At least he leaves a trail.
Xander! Xander!
-Xander, don't move. -[crying]
It's okay, Xander.
Hey! What-- [grunts]
The driver's still in there!
-Hey! The door is stuck! -Wait, hold on. One second, okay?
-Hey! -[cries]
Good boy, Titus. Okay, hold on.
Oh, why won't it...
budge!
[panting] I'm okay. How much milk is that kid drinking?
translation.de: Ich bin gerettet. Wie viel Milch trinkt dieses Kind?

translation.en: -[people cheering] -[chuckles] Look at that. These babies could be heroes. Yay, Titus.
-Or not. -Uh-oh.
What was in there?
Just a lot of priceless artifacts from a museum.
You know, 17th century Ming Dynasty, things that can never be replaced.
-And my house keys were in there. -It's not that long of a drop.
translation.de: Und meine Hausschlüssel. So tief ist es ja nicht.

translation.en: -I'm sure everything's fine. -[blasts]
translation.de: So tief ist es ja nicht.

translation.en: Okay, pacifiers for everyone.
We better get outta here.
Oh no.
Keep your human skin suits on and your hands where we can see them.
Stand down, alien menace!
I'm not an alien menace.
That's just what an alien menace would say.
translation.de: Genau das würde ein Alien sagen.

translation.en: You shoot any spider babies outta your face, we will take you out.
translation.de: Wenn ihr Spinnen abfeuert, legen wir euch um.

translation.en: Do not be swayed by their cute demeanor and chubby cheeks!
translation.de: Fallt nicht auf ihre süßen Pummelbacken rein!

translation.en: Quarantine this area right now.
Careful. Keep away from their mouth and hands.
translation.de: Vorsicht. Pass auf Mund und Hände auf.

translation.en: Ew. We've got saliva.
Get a stool sample! Send those diapers to the CDC!
translation.de: Stuhlprobe nehmen! Schickt die Windeln ans CDC!

translation.en: They're just babies! Don't hurt them!
They like Lionel Richie. Mostly his greatest hits.
translation.de: Sie stehen auf Lionel Richies größte Hits.

translation.en: Well, you've tested human. I just need to know why you're working for them.
translation.de: Nun, ihr seid also Menschen. Aber warum arbeitet ihr für sie?

translation.en: This is a big misunderstanding.
All I did was accidentally open up a wormhole by playing a video game.
translation.de: Ich habe nur aus Versehen ein Wurmloch geöffnet.

translation.en: Planet Master? Do you know it?
And who are you calling on this?
The Russians? The French? The French Canadians?
The Canadian Russians? Martian communists?
No! But there's someone else you should be worried about.
translation.de: Nein! Aber da ist jemand, um den Sie sich sorgen sollten.

translation.en: I can't even believe she told you that. She did. And then she says to me that she wants to see other people.
translation.de: -Krass, dass sie das gesagt hat. -Ja. Und sie will andere treffen.

translation.en: Ouch, that's cold.
So she's single?
What? Did you seriously just say she--
Say what, Nate?
Nate.
HQ--
Hold that thought.
I'm confused here. We tracked an alien pod to you two,
translation.de: Ich bin verwirrt. Bei euch lag eine Alienkapsel.

translation.en: but all our background searches come up with are Red Lobster, Sephora,
translation.de: Aber unsere Recherchen führen nur zu Red Lobster, Sephora,

translation.en: Pinkberry and a website called acnesolutions.com
What? [splutters] No, that's, uh, I've never heard of...
translation.de: Was? Nein, davon habe ich noch nie....

translation.en: In all my days as a Marine, a Navy Seal,
translation.de: In meiner Zeit als Marine, Navy Seal,

translation.en: LAPD, FBI, and a Girl Scout Leader of the Year,
translation.de: beim LAPD, FBI und als Pfadfinderin des Jahres

translation.en: I've never heard such a load of--
translation.de: -habe ich noch nie so viel... -General? Eindringlinge.

translation.en: [soldier] General, we have intruders. They're moving to--
translation.de: -habe ich noch nie so viel... -General? Eindringlinge. Sie kommen...

translation.en: Moving where?
Come back, soldier!
Perimeter, report!
Until I know what's going on, you will do nothing and go nowhere.
translation.de: Ihr haltet die Füße still, bis ich mehr weiß.

translation.en: -Understood? -Let us help.
Do nothing, go nowhere.
Who does she think she is? They can't keep us in here.
translation.de: Für wen hält die sich? Das geht doch nicht. Es muss doch...

translation.en: -There's gotta be a way out of-- -Shhh.
translation.de: Das geht doch nicht. Es muss doch...

translation.en: -I don't hear anything. -Exactly.
It's him, Dr. Arcannis.
[laughs] We're going for a little ride. Fleech, get them in the sport utility vehicle.
translation.de: Wir machen einen kleinen Ausflug. Fleech, pack sie in den SUV.

translation.en: Mark this day in your planet's history, hoomans.
-My little helpers are about to make me... -[babies crying] ...the most powerful being in the universe!
translation.de: Meine kleinen Helfer machen mich zum mächtigsten Wesen des Universums!

translation.en: What is this?
They're gone.
-What? Sh-- Should we go after them? -And do what?
translation.de: Sollen wir sie verfolgen? Und dann?

translation.en: I saw the warning. But I didn't listen. I just wanted to win.
translation.de: Ich habe die Warnung ignoriert. Weil ich gewinnen wollte.

translation.en: This isn't a game. It's real.
The whole Earth is doomed, and it's my fault.
translation.de: Die Erde ist verloren. Wegen mir.

translation.en: -Come on. You are Fearless. -No, don't call me that.
I'm not Fearless. I'm useless.
translation.de: Ich bin nicht furchtlos. Ich bin nutzlos.

translation.en: Just my luck. They're teethin'.
I'm not as tasty as I look. Who am I kidding? I'm probably delicious.
translation.de: So lecker bin ich nicht! Ach was, bin ich sicher.

translation.en: No use fighting it. There's no way out of this one.
translation.de: Es ist zwecklos. Es gibt keinen Ausweg.

translation.en: I'm-- I'm never gonna see my babies again.
translation.de: Ich sehe meine Babys nie wieder.

translation.en: I can plan a Red Cross food drive, a homecoming dance,
translation.de: Ich kann Hilfsaktionen und Klassentreffen planen,

translation.en: I can raise $8,000 to save the elephants.
But this? I'm-- I'm all out of ideas, Reid.
translation.de: Aber hier bin ich ratlos, Reid.

translation.en: This would be so much easier if it was a video game.
translation.de: Es wäre so viel einfacher, wenn es ein Spiel wäre.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
What if this was a video game?
What would you do?
I don't know. l'd look around for tools, for power-ups.
translation.de: Tja, nach Werkzeugen und Power-ups suchen?

translation.en: I wouldn't give up.
You know what? I've been living my whole life through a screen. What good is it being Fearless in a fake world?
translation.de: Das Spiel war mein Leben, weißt du? Aber was nützt es, dort furchtlos zu sein?

translation.en: It's time to start being Fearless out here, where it counts.
Wow. Somebody just got off the couch.
translation.de: Wow. Kriegt da etwa jemand den Hintern hoch?

translation.en: Let's find a way outta here, huh?
Wait a minute. I can't believe I didn't think of it before. That's a sat phone.
translation.de: Warte, das ist die Idee! Das ist ein Satellitentelefon.

translation.en: It's a super powerful walkie-talkie.
They link to satellites. NASA-level gear.
It could boost our signal. You can fix the communicator.
Yes! Now let's go stop Grinchface.
translation.de: Ja! Und jetzt stoppen wir denn Grinch.

translation.en: Game on.
General. You're gonna have to trust me. We're the good guys,
translation.de: General! Vertrauen Sie mir. -Wir werden sie aufhalten. -Wenn wir sie kriegen.

translation.en: -and we're gonna stop the bad guys. -If we can catch them in time.
translation.de: -Wir werden sie aufhalten. -Wenn wir sie kriegen.

translation.en: [Reid] Whoa! The Obsidian.
It's even cooler in person. You can take a selfie later!
translation.de: -In echt ist sie noch cooler. -Spar dir das für später.

translation.en: Watch the road! [Reid] Whoa! Shrimp!
Didn't you say you've ridden a motorcycle before?
translation.de: Du bist doch schon mal gefahren.

translation.en: -Yes, in Planet Master. -What?
Okay, it's now or never.
Sorry, this is a lot different than a rocket bike.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, im Spiel ist es anders.

translation.en: Here goes.
I think we're on.
Hello? Come in, Captain. Captain, can you hear us?
translation.de: Hallo? Bitte kommen, Captain. Hören Sie uns?

translation.en: -[beeps] -[Captain] This is Lightspeed. Good to hear your voice again.
translation.de: Lightspeed hier. Schön dich zu hören.

translation.en: -We got him! -Yeah!
-[Melanie] Arcannis has your babies. -What?
They're on The Obsidian, but we won't let them get away.
translation.de: Auf der Obsidian, aber wir sind dran.

translation.en: [Captain] I can finally pinpoint your location.
Do not let Arcannis absorb those babies' powers, or Earth is doomed.
translation.de: Ihr müsst Arcannis aufhalten, sonst ist die Erde verloren.

translation.en: Okay, we can do this.
I played every level. I know every inch of that ship. Arcannis is no match for my expert-- [spits]
translation.de: Ich kenne das Schiff in- und auswendig. Dagegen hat Arcannis...

translation.en: -Oh! Swallowed a bug. -[beeps]
-[Melanie] Are we gonna catch them? -Yes, we will.
If we land on top of it, we can get inside through the engine intake ports.
translation.de: Wenn wir auf ihr landen, können wir durch die Ansaugkanäle rein.

translation.en: Wait, what?
-Trust me, I've done this before. -Not in real life.
translation.de: -Ich habe das schon mal gemacht. -Nicht in echt.

translation.en: Get ready to jump. I will never be ready to jump!
[sighs] Or we can also go in this way.
If Fearless isn't giving up, then neither am I.
translation.de: Wenn er nicht aufgibt, gebe ich auch nicht auf.

translation.en: I just need a way out.
[toy] Baby Bottle Bonus.
Wherever heroes are needed.
Fastest nipple in the galaxy. Take that!
translation.de: Der schnellste Sauger der Galaxie. Nimm das!

translation.en: Time to pick up the kids.
What? Huh? What?
Sweet George Washington. Looks like those kids were right.
translation.de: Heiliger George Washington! Die Kinder hatten wohl recht.

translation.en: -I need birds in the air now! -Yes, ma'am.
No lobster-headed space invader gets a drop on me.
-Yes, ma'am. -If he thinks a ray gun and pointy collar makes him king of the moon men, well, ha.
translation.de: Wenn er denkt, dass eine Strahlenkanone und ein spitzer Kragen genügen...

translation.en: He's never tangled with the human spirit.
-Okay, I'm done. -Yes, ma'am.
Good. Connect the chairs to the machine.
translation.de: Gut. Verbinde die Stühle mit der Maschine.

translation.en: The absorption chamber is ready.
Their little powers have blossomed so much.
translation.de: Die Kleinen sind so stark geworden.

translation.en: This will be an excellent harvest.
The isolated gene combinations from their DNA will be fed directly into this implant.
translation.de: Ihre isolierten Genkombinationen werden über dieses Implantat eingespeist.

translation.en: Activate The Extrapolator. I will be in my cocoon.
translation.de: Aktivieren. Ich bin in meinem Kokon.

translation.en: No, go to the Settings menu, then Preferences, then Power Level.
Not Tools! Power Level!
Yes.
I can feel it.
So what's the plan?
You find the babies, I'm gonna stop this ship.
translation.de: Du suchst die Babys, ich stoppe das Schiff.

translation.en: And how do we do that? Simple.
All right, so I've memorized the scheme of this place.
You're gonna keep going through this tunnel,
then you're gonna end up at a bunch of scary mechanical objects.
translation.de: stößt du auf ein paar fiese mechanische Objekte.

translation.en: Just gotta get through 'em.
-[Melanie] That sounds dangerous. -[Reid] It is. [chuckles] It is.
translation.de: -Da musst du durch. -Klingt gefährlich. Ist es auch.

translation.en: Do not touch anything, okay?
Go to Lab A, not Lab B, because that's the one where he's growing the monsters and mutating the animals.
translation.de: Gehe zu Labor A, nicht Labor B. Dort sind nämlich die Monster.

translation.en: I think there's a two-headed squid in there with swords for hands.
-It's okay. You'll be fine. -[Melanie] I think we should switch jobs.
[Reid] We can't. I'm the only one who knows how to get past security lasers
translation.de: Geht nicht. Nur ich komme an den Lasern vorbei.

translation.en: and the security drones
and the security bees,
which is not a technical term, they're just bees.
[Melanie] Are you serious?
[Reid] But that's a lot of bees.
I'll sabotage the flight controls,
then I'll cut through the torture chamber and the racquetball court,
translation.de: gehe durch die Folterkammer und den Tennisplatz

translation.en: and I-- I don't know what else, uh...
Yeah?
-I hate this plan. -See you in five.
We're gonna laugh about this, I promise.
-[pilot 1] The aircraft is in sight. -[pilot 2] All right Jersey, stay focused.
translation.de: Flugobjekt in Sicht. Ok, Jersey, cool bleiben. Es sind Zivilisten an Bord.

translation.en: Let's keep it tight. There are civilians on board.
translation.de: Ok, Jersey, cool bleiben. Es sind Zivilisten an Bord.

translation.en: Let's fire a warning shot.
[pilot 1] This is by order of the U.S. government. You will follow us to a landing sight or be forced down.
translation.de: Befehl der US-Regierung. Folgen Sie uns oder wir schießen Sie ab.

translation.en: -[pilot 2] He's out of control! -[pilot 1] Break away! Break away!
[pilot 2] This guy's not coming down quietly. We gotta take this thing down.
translation.de: Er landet nicht freiwillig. Wir müssen feuern.

translation.en: General, we are awaiting missile authorization.
No, no, no, no! No! Oh, my gosh. I found you guys.
translation.de: Nein! Oh mein Gott, ich habe euch gefunden!

translation.en: I fear for my life, but this is way better than a game.
translation.de: Angst hin oder her, das ist viel besser als ein Spiel.

translation.en: All right, hands up!
All of them...
-[yells] -Where I can see them.
That is all of them, right?
Land this ship, now.
Whoa! Oh! Yeah. More of that.
Holy guacamole! This thing's a lot of fun.
You found them!
So good news, bad news: the fastest way to land this ship is to crash it.
translation.de: Der schnellste Weg nach unten ist leider ein Absturz.

translation.en: We've gotta get someplace safe. Here, take them.
translation.de: Wir müssen uns schützen. Hier, nimm sie.

translation.en: [pilot 2] Hold fire! Someone's taking it down from the inside.
translation.de: Nicht feuern! Sie gehen auf Sinkflug.

translation.en: Oh, no. No.
We've gotta escape. Escape in a pod of some kind, maybe--
translation.de: Wir müssen hier weg. Mit einer Kapsel oder so.

translation.en: Hang on to something!
[robot] Your pod has been deployed.
Um... thanks.
The power courses through my veins.
translation.de: Die Kraft fließt durch meine Adern.

translation.en: Better, stronger,
supercharged.
The poopy diaper just hit the fan.
And poop just got real.
Now that I've been freed from that insipid game by that foolish boy,
translation.de: Jetzt, da mich dieser Trottel aus dem Spiel befreit hat,

translation.en: I shall conquer your planet.
You'll have to go through me first.
I see you brought an army. [chuckles]
So did I.
Fire!
You are insects.
And you will be destroyed like insects.
translation.de: Und ihr werdet wie Insekten zerquetscht!

translation.en: Today I declare myself King of Earth.
translation.de: Ich erkläre mich heute zum König der Erde.

translation.en: First order of business, we are changing that name.
Oh, this is bad. There's gotta be a way to stop him.
translation.de: Oh nein. Wie halte ich ihn nur auf?

translation.en: -We've gotta get these babies to safety. -What's wrong with them?
I don't know. Ever since they were in that machine, they've been totally out of it.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Sind sie total durch den Wind.

translation.en: Keep them safe. I have an idea.
translation.de: Pass auf sie auf. Ich habe eine Idee.

translation.en: -[babies moaning] -Wait. Reid, are you crazy?
Be careful!
I still don't wanna die like this! No! No! No!
translation.de: Ich will immer noch nicht so sterben! Nein!

translation.en: What is that horrible--
You mock me with your vehicle of frozen confections?
translation.de: Du verspottest mich mit gefrorenen Süßkram?

translation.en: No!
Ah, the boy who's been in my way.
translation.de: Ah. Der Junge, der mir im Weg stand.

translation.en: You've got what you want now. We're no threat to you.
translation.de: Sie haben doch, was Sie wollten.

translation.en: Just leave. Go master another planet.
Ah. There they are.
I wondered where the little saplings had gone to.
translation.de: Ich habe die Kleinen schon vermisst.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I think it's time I end the Lightspeed lineage for good.
translation.de: Ich fürchte, ich muss Lightspeeds Familie auslöschen.

translation.en: I won't let you touch them!
I will destroy anyone I please.
Especially those babies. Now step aside!
translation.de: Vor allem diese Babys. Und jetzt aus dem Weg!

translation.en: -Not gonna happen, green beans. -Huh?
I made this mess, and it's up to me to clean it up.
translation.de: Ich bringe das hier wieder in Ordnung.

translation.en: And if that means standing in your way, no matter what…
translation.de: Und wenn ich dafür hier stehenbleiben muss...

translation.en: that's what I'm gonna do.
Wow, that was quite a speech. What are you gonna do, gamer boy?
translation.de: Wow. Beeindruckende Rede. Und jetzt? Schießt du mich mit Worten ab?

translation.en: -Shoot me down with a speech? -[groans]
translation.de: Und jetzt? Schießt du mich mit Worten ab?

translation.en: It was inspiring. [groans]
I begin my reign with a show of force.
An example to those who would dare cross me.
translation.de: Auf dass es niemand mehr wagt, sich mir zu widersetzen.

translation.en: Any more pathetic attempts at being a hero will be crushed.
translation.de: Jede weitere dieser Heldentaten wird zermalmt.

translation.en: Crushed to dust.
So you will learn the meaning of being fearless.
translation.de: Damit ihr lernt, was furchtlos bedeutet.

translation.en: What?
Ah! It's not possible!
She's breaking through the barrier!
-Titus? -[in Vin Diesel's voice] Goo-goo-ga.
The voice of Vin Diesel.
-High five. -High five.
They got 'em on the run people! Attack!
You glow, girl.
[Reid] Yeah, Kira!
Wow. A natural-born gamer.
-[tires screeching] -Hop in. Let's do some damage.
Yeah you better run. Little toad.
translation.de: Ja, lauf nur, du kleine Kröte.

translation.en: -[Reid yells] -[Melanie] Oh, no! Make it stop!
[chuckles] She can just do everything now, can't she?
There's something on Arcannis's neck.
If we take that out, I think we take his power.
translation.de: Wenn wir es entfernen, verliert er seine Kraft.

translation.en: -She doesn't understand. -Yes, she does.
You've got your daddy's eyes. And they shoot lightning death blasts.
translation.de: Du hast Papas Augen. Und sie schießen Blitze.

translation.en: So just remember what he taught you. You got this.
translation.de: Denk einfach daran, was du gelernt hast.

translation.en: No!
Yes!
Bullseye.
[groans] I can feel the power leaving.
You can't steal superpowers.
No! No!
Noooo!
No!
Better late than never!
Boy, that's a horrible catchphrase. Strike that.
Captain! You're here!
You know what, frog face? You made me miss Crabfest. I haven't missed Crabfest in seven years.
translation.de: Wegen dir habe ich das Crabfest verpasst. Zum ersten Mal seit sieben Jahren.

translation.en: -So I'm not in a good mood at all. -[yells]
Hey, she's good. What game is she from? No, she's all real.
translation.de: -Sie ist gut. Aus welchem Spiel ist sie? -Oh, sie ist echt.

translation.en: I'm here to assist, general.
These must be your kids.
Seems like things are… well in hand.
translation.de: Sie haben wohl... alles im Griff.

translation.en: Where's Kira?
She's the one without any...
powers.
Dada!
Hey. You got 'em.
-[Titus] Dada! -[groans]
-[Captain] They grow up so fast. -Hmm.
Where's the pacifier? It's time to calm them down.
translation.de: Wo ist der Schnuller? Das genügt jetzt.

translation.en: Um... no pacifiers. Does anyone have any Lionel Richie?
translation.de: Ich habe keinen. Hat jemand Lionel Richie?

translation.en: I got a Commodores album in my car. Not the same thing, private.
translation.de: -Ich hätte die Commodores. -Das ist nicht dasselbe.

translation.en: You! Play some Lionel Richie like your life depended on it.
translation.de: Du, spiel Lionel Richie! Um dein Leben!

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first time.
-We don't need an ambulance. -How about some blankets?
-What for? -I don't know.
We just always give you blankets.
You know, this was a crazy weekend, but it might've been the best one of my life.
translation.de: Das war ein verrücktes Wochenende. Aber das beste meines Lebens.

translation.en: Really? It wasn't on your schedule.
I think you kinda owe me a crab dinner.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
All right. [chuckles] You got it.
But we still never got to that science project.
translation.de: -Aber aus dem Projekt wurde nichts. -Hey, ihr zwei.

translation.en: Hey, you two. I think you might have dropped this.
translation.de: -Aber aus dem Projekt wurde nichts. -Hey, ihr zwei. Das habt ihr wohl verloren.

translation.en: Or maybe we did.
It is perfect. And nothing like I planned.
translation.de: Es ist perfekt. Und so völlig ungeplant.

translation.en: Thank you, Fearless. You saved the day when I couldn't. Not everyone would've done that.
translation.de: Danke, Fearless. Du hast mich vertreten. Das hätte nicht jeder getan.

translation.en: A few days ago, I wouldn't have done that. The real world is a whole new level.
translation.de: Ich früher auch nicht. Die echte Welt ist ein anderes Level.

translation.en: I couldn't have gotten here without help from Buckethead.
translation.de: Ohne Holzkopf wäre ich nicht hier.

translation.en: Wait a second. Buckethead?
Oh. You guys know each other?
-[Buckethead] What's up, Reid? -What? How?
[Buckethead] You know I got your back. Who do you think got him his Baby Bottle Bonus?
translation.de: Ich habe dir geholfen. Woher hatte er wohl das Fläschchen?

translation.en: I guess we've finished the final level together, Elliot.
translation.de: Wir haben es wohl zusammen geschafft, Elliot.

translation.en: [Buckethead] We sure did. We did it together.
Fearless and the Finisher.
Bye, Xander.
-Think happy thoughts. -[giggles]
Titus. One for the road?
-And you. -[gasps]
-Hmm. -I'll miss you.
Hang on to that, you two, in case we need you again.
translation.de: -Behaltet es. Falls wir euch mal brauchen. -Wohin fliegt ihr?

translation.en: -Where you headed next? -Wherever heroes are needed.
translation.de: -Behaltet es. Falls wir euch mal brauchen. -Wohin fliegt ihr? Wo Helden gebraucht werden.

translation.en: Can you believe we got an A+ on our science project? That's a relief.
translation.de: -Krass, dass wir eine Eins bekommen haben. -Ja.

translation.en: Otherwise my parents never would've forgiven me for trashing the house.
translation.de: Meine Eltern hätten mir das mit dem Haus nie verziehen.

translation.en: -And we finally got our date. -[chuckles]
translation.de: Und wir haben endlich unser Date.

translation.en: We really bent the laws of reality this weekend.
translation.de: Wir haben die Grenzen der Realität verschoben.

translation.en: What if we're just characters in someone else's game?
translation.de: Was, wenn wir nur Spielfiguren sind?

translation.en: I hardly know what's real anymore.
translation.de: Ich weiß kaum noch, was echt ist.

translation.en: This? This is real enough for me.
translation.de: Das hier... ist echt genug für mich.

translation.en: Game on, Fearless!
Looks like we're taking it to the next level.
translation.de: Sieht nach einem neuen Level aus.

translation.en: [baby giggles] Bye-bye.
